price: ߊ߲ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߢߐ߯ߡߍߡߛߏ ߟߋ߬ ߗߋ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߘߐߓߐ߫ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߸ ߌߟߋ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߜߋ߬ߟߎ߲߬ ߘߐߙߐ߲߫ ߞߵߌ ߡߎ߬ߢߎ߲߬
arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā mur'silū al-nāqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-iṣ'ṭabir
